## isOnLocalContainer variable

SA\_JSON\_KEY is an environment variable that I use when running a containerized application on my laptop. It's JSON-stringified service account credentials.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isOnLocalContainer: (env: NodeJS.ProcessEnv) => boolean
```
